overview: The evening meeting is Radio X-Sights! With Phil and Eva, it is impossible to get bored! On the program tonight: your fantasies. They are accompanied by Patrick, a sexologist specializing in fantasies. Voyeurism, threesome, hitchhiker or cap and tank top, the desires are multiple and it is a question of realizing them live tonight! Open your ears (and your eyes) wide, Radio X-Sights promises you a torrid evening!
title: Radio X-Sights
